sqlMap.select:
select REQUEST_SEQ, REQUEST_TYPE, BUSINESS_BATCHNO, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, AUDITOR, REQUEST_AMOUNT, REQUEST_COUNT, VALID_AMOUNT, VALID_COUNT, IS_PAYERPAYFEE, FEE, REALPAY_AMOUNT, REALOUT_AMOUNT, REQUEST_SRC, AUDIT_REMARK, PROCESS_TYPE from FO.BATCH_PAYMENTREQBASEINFO
order by $orderByClause$

select REQUEST_SEQ, REQUEST_TYPE, BUSINESS_BATCHNO, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, AUDITOR, REQUEST_AMOUNT, REQUEST_COUNT, VALID_AMOUNT, VALID_COUNT, IS_PAYERPAYFEE, FEE, REALPAY_AMOUNT, REALOUT_AMOUNT, REQUEST_SRC, AUDIT_REMARK, PROCESS_TYPE from FO.BATCH_PAYMENTREQBASEINFO where REQUEST_SEQ = #requestSeq:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT 200 || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yymmddhh24mi') || LPAD(SEQ_FO_REQUEST_CYCLE.nextval, 6, 0) AS ID FROM DUAL
insert into FO.BATCH_PAYMENTREQBASEINFO (REQUEST_SEQ, REQUEST_TYPE, BUSINESS_BATCHNO, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, AUDITOR, REQUEST_AMOUNT, REQUEST_COUNT, VALID_AMOUNT, VALID_COUNT, IS_PAYERPAYFEE, FEE, REALPAY_AMOUNT, REALOUT_AMOUNT, REQUEST_SRC, AUDIT_REMARK, PROCESS_TYPE) values (#requestSeq:DECIMAL#, #requestType:DECIMAL#, #requestSeq:DECIMAL#, #payerName:VARCHAR#, #payerLoginName:VARCHAR#, #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#, #payerMemberType:DECIMAL#, #payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#, #payerAcctType:DECIMAL#, #creator:VARCHAR#, #createDate:TIMESTAMP#, #updateDate:TIMESTAMP#, #status:DECIMAL#, #auditor:VARCHAR#, #requestAmount:DECIMAL#, #requestCount:DECIMAL#, #validAmount:DECIMAL#, #validCount:DECIMAL#, #isPayerPayFee:DECIMAL#, #fee:DECIMAL#, #realpayAmount:DECIMAL#, #realoutAmount:DECIMAL#, #requestSrc:VARCHAR#, #auditRemark:VARCHAR#, #processType:DECIMAL#)

SELECT 200 || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yymmddhh24mi') || LPAD(SEQ_FO_REQUEST_CYCLE.nextval, 6, 0) AS ID FROM DUAL
insert into FO.BATCH_PAYMENTREQBASEINFO
REQUEST_SEQ

)
values

#requestType:DECIMAL#
#businessBatchNo#
#payerName:VARCHAR#

sqlMap.update:
update FO.BATCH_PAYMENTREQBASEINFO
REQUEST_SEQ = #record.requestSeq:DECIMAL#
REQUEST_TYPE = #record.requestType:DECIMAL#
BUSINESS_BATCHNO = #record.businessBatchNo:VARCHAR#
PAYER_NAME = #record.payerName:VARCHAR#
PAYER_LOGINNAME = #record.payerLoginName:VARCHAR#
PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #record.payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#
PAYER_MEMBERTYPE = #record.payerMemberType:DECIMAL#
PAYER_ACCTCODE = #record.payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#
PAYER_ACCTTYPE = #record.payerAcctType:DECIMAL#
CREATOR = #record.creator:VARCHAR#
CREATE_DATE = #record.createDate:TIMESTAMP#
UPDATE_DATE = #record.updateDate:TIMESTAMP#
STATUS = #record.status:DECIMAL#
AUDITOR = #record.auditor:VARCHAR#
REQUEST_AMOUNT = #record.requestAmount:DECIMAL#
REQUEST_COUNT = #record.requestCount:DECIMAL#
VALID_AMOUNT = #record.validAmount:DECIMAL#
VALID_COUNT = #record.validCount:DECIMAL#
IS_PAYERPAYFEE = #record.isPayerPayFee:DECIMAL#
FEE = #record.fee:DECIMAL#
REALPAY_AMOUNT = #record.realpayAmount:DECIMAL#
REALOUT_AMOUNT = #record.realoutAmount:DECIMAL#
REQUEST_SRC = #record.requestSrc:VARCHAR#
AUDIT_REMARK = #record.auditRemark:VARCHAR#
PROCESS_TYPE = #record.processType:DECIMAL#

update FO.BATCH_PAYMENTREQBASEINFO set REQUEST_SEQ = #record.requestSeq:DECIMAL#, REQUEST_TYPE = #record.requestType:DECIMAL#, BUSINESS_BATCHNO = #record.businessBatchNo:VARCHAR#, PAYER_NAME = #record.payerName:VARCHAR#, PAYER_LOGINNAME = #record.payerLoginName:VARCHAR#, PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #record.payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE = #record.payerMemberType:DECIMAL#, PAYER_ACCTCODE = #record.payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#, PAYER_ACCTTYPE = #record.payerAcctType:DECIMAL#, CREATOR = #record.creator:VARCHAR#, CREATE_DATE = #record.createDate:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATE_DATE = #record.updateDate:TIMESTAMP#, STATUS = #record.status:DECIMAL#, AUDITOR = #record.auditor:VARCHAR#, REQUEST_AMOUNT = #record.requestAmount:DECIMAL#, REQUEST_COUNT = #record.requestCount:DECIMAL#, VALID_AMOUNT = #record.validAmount:DECIMAL#, VALID_COUNT = #record.validCount:DECIMAL#, IS_PAYERPAYFEE = #record.isPayerPayFee:DECIMAL#, FEE = #record.fee:DECIMAL#, REALPAY_AMOUNT = #record.realpayAmount:DECIMAL#, REALOUT_AMOUNT = #record.realoutAmount:DECIMAL#, REQUEST_SRC = #record.requestSrc:VARCHAR#, AUDIT_REMARK = #record.auditRemark:VARCHAR#, PROCESS_TYPE = #record.processType:DECIMAL#

PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#

PAYER_ACCTTYPE = #payerAcctType:DECIMAL#

UPDATE_DATE = #updateDate:TIMESTAMP#

AUDITOR = #auditor:VARCHAR#

where REQUEST_SEQ = #requestSeq:DECIMAL#
